member.name: T:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter
member.summary: Provides custom JSON deserialization for objects marked with .

member.name: M:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Takes a list of assemblies to be used for initialization.
member.param: List of assemblies to use for initialization.

member.name: M:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter.InitializeConverter(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Initializes the converter by scanning the assemblies for types with the and populates the BaseToPropertyData dictionary.
member.param: List of assemblies to scan, if any. If null, the executing assembly and assemblies referencing current assembly are used.

member.name: M:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON object based on the defined typifying property.

member.name: M:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.PolymorphicJsonConverter.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if the given type can be converted using this converter.
member.param: Type of the object to check.
member.returns: True if the type can be converted; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:DysonCore.PolymorphicJson.TypifyingPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Marks property for polymorphic deserialization as a qualifier. Should be used on property declaration and value assignment.
